citations.narrative:
During inspection it was found that dog food bags were stored in the shop away from the wall but directly on the concrete
floor. Storing food directly on the floor makes it so there is a higher risk of pest infestation and there is less ability to clean
around and under the stored food.
All food and bedding supplies must be stored away from the walls and off the floor. All open supplies of food and bedding
must be kept in leakproof containers with tightly fitting lids to prevent contamination and spoilage.
Correction Date: January 6th, 2024
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
n

narrative:
3.1(e) 
   
Housing facilities, general. 
During inspection it was found that dog food bags were stored in the shop away from the wall but directly on the concrete 
floor. Storing food directly on the floor makes it so there is a higher risk of pest infestation and there is less ability to clean 
around and under the stored food.  
All food and bedding supplies must be stored away from the walls and off the floor. All open supplies of food and bedding 
must be kept in leakproof containers with tightly fitting lids to prevent contamination and spoilage.  
Correction Date: January 6th, 2024 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative. 
 
 n
